fields.summary: Sync rbw dir on the first hsync() to avoid file lost on power failure

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

fields.description: HDFS-11915 (Sync rbw dir on the first hsync() to avoid file lost on power failure) is a nice fix to have. Since a related fix HDFS-5042 was backported in branch-2.8 and branch-2.7. HDFS-11915 should get backported as well.
